name: tutorial
content: Just as you would pass props in react component, add props to all the places to make them appear at the destination

name: hint
content: Follow the flowchart from parent to the destination

name: tasks
content: The cats shown in different rooms are imported in their respective components. Start where the cat is imported then pass the props down to destination.

name: taskThree
content: One way to send information from child component to its parent is by using a call back function
